## Summary

A short summary of the bug (one sentence).

## Environment

* Browser / app shell: (e.g., Safari, Chrome, installed PWA)
* Assistive tech used: (e.g., VoiceOver, NVDA, switch input)

1. Go to…
2. Click/tap…
3. Observe…

## Expected behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior

What actually happened.

## Additional notes

* Attach screenshots or short recordings (avoid sensitive info).
* If this affects an AAC user specifically, describe how it impacts communication.

## Priority (optional)

* P0 (blocks communication)
* P1 (major usability/accessibility issue)
